mapper.select: select id, name, 1 as level, -1 as parentId, CONCAT('study_', id) as nodeId from study where deleted=0 and id=#{studyId}

select c.id, c.name, 2 as level, sc.study_id as parent_id, CONCAT('crf_form_', c.id) as node_id, c.property from study_crf sc inner join crf c on sc.crf_form_id=c.id and c.type=1 and c.level=1 where c.deleted=0 and study_id=#{studyId}
select c.id, c.name, 3 as level, c.parent_id, CONCAT('crf_', c.id) as node_id, c.property from crf c where `level`=2 and type=2 and deleted=0 and c.parent_id=#{crfFormId}

select distinct(d.id) as id, d.name, 4 as level, cdf.crf_id as parent_id, CONCAT('dict_', d.id, '_', cdf.crf_id) as node_id from crf_dict_field cdf INNER JOIN dictionary d on cdf.dict_id=d.id and d.level=2 and d.deleted=0 where cdf.deleted=0 and cdf.crf_id=#{id} and cdf.crf_form_id=#{parentId}

select cdf.id, f.id as field_id, f.name, f.label, cdf.display from crf_dict_field cdf inner join field f on cdf.field_id=f.id where cdf.deleted=0 and f.deleted=0 and cdf.crf_id=#{parentId} and cdf.dict_id=#{id}
mapper.update: update crf_dict_field set display=#{display}, update_time=#{updateTime} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select c.id, c.name, c.table_name, c.level from study_crf sc inner join crf c on sc.crf_form_id=c.id and c.type=1 and c.level=1 where deleted=0 and study_id=#{studyId}

select cdf.id, f.id as field_id, f.label, f.name, f.field_type, f.data_type, f.required, cdf.field_name, f.unit, f.min_value, f.max_value, f.description, f.default_value, cdf.id as crf_dict_field_id, cdf.display, 'false' as disabled from crf_dict_field cdf left join field f on cdf.field_id=f.id where cdf.crf_form_id=#{crfFormId} and cdf.deleted=0 and f.deleted=0 and cdf.generate_to_db=1 and cdf.field_name is not null and cdf.display=0

select cdf.id, f.id as field_id, f.label, f.name, f.field_type, f.data_type, f.required, cdf.field_name, f.unit, f.min_value, f.max_value, f.description, f.default_value, cdf.id as crf_dict_field_id, cdf.display, 'false' as disabled from crf_dict_field cdf left join field f on cdf.field_id=f.id where cdf.crf_form_id=#{crfFormId} and cdf.deleted=0 and f.deleted=0 and cdf.generate_to_db=1 and cdf.field_name is not null

select cdf.id, f.id as field_id, f.label, f.name, f.field_type, f.data_type, f.required, cdf.field_name, f.unit, f.min_value, f.max_value, f.description, f.default_value, cdf.id as crf_dict_field_id, cdf.display, cdf.generate_to_db, 'false' as disabled from crf_dict_field cdf left join field f on cdf.field_id=f.id where cdf.crf_form_id=#{crfFormId} and cdf.deleted=0 and f.deleted=0
AND cdf.crf_id=#{crfSecondId}
select id, field_option, display_order, status from field_option fo where fo.deleted=0 and fo.field_id=#{fieldId} order by display_order
select c.id, c.name, 2 as level, -1 as parent_id, CONCAT('crf_form_', c.id) as node_id from crf c where c.deleted=0 and c.id=#{crfFormId}
select * from ${tableName} where deleted=0 and objectId=#{objectId} order by id DESC
